text: Satisambojjhaṅgaṃ tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhu bhāveti satisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchati
edit: Satisambojjhaṅgaṃ tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhu bhāveti satisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchati

translations.transtext: In that occasion, the monk cultivates the mindfulness-factor of the enlightenment. In that occasion, the monk's mindfulness-factor of the enlightenment becomes fully developed.
